title: Sterlite Power secures orders worth Rs 1,400 crore in Oct-Dec qtr
description: During the quarter ending December 2023, Sterlite Power has secured new orders valued at Rs 1,400 crore. These orders, originating from both domestic and export markets, encompass high-performance power conductors, optical ground wire (OPGW), power cables, and other products.
